page.title: 02EARLS COLNE
page.content: {Earls Colne}seems a very big village because it is so spread out.Earls Colne has a{Primary School}a{Church and a{Sports Centre}with Badminton, Squash and Tennis coarts.It has a population of about 2000 and 275 children attend the Primary School. The school was built in 1983 so that the children didn't have to go from one building to another. The Sports Centre was built out of money from a will left by W.A Hunt.Mr.Hunt had lived in the village all his life and he had started Earls Colnes only factory{Hunts}. Earls Colne is twinned with a{ French town called{Nonancourt}.
